modName: Read and learn Speechcraft - Spanish translation
summary:
Traduccion al castellano de Read and Learn Speechcraft

Thanks to Dryblood
descriptionHtml:
[center]Si te gustó la traducción no te olvides de endorsar[/center]
[line]
[center][size=+1,5][color=red]Descripción[/color][/size][/center]
[line]

Traducción al castellano del mod \"Read and Learn Speechcraft\" de Dryblood.
Te permite mejorar tu elocuencia leyendo libros.

[line]
[center][size=+1,5][color=red]Requisitos[/color][/size][/center]
[line]

Instala primero el mod original
Usa Nexus Mod Manager

[line]
[center][size=+1,5][color=red]Link mod original[/color][/size][/center]
[line]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21765//?]Read and Learn Speechcraft by Dryblood[/url]

[line]
[center][size=+1,5][color=red]Credits/Créditos[/color][/size][/center]
[line]

All credits go to Dryblood, thanks for the mod!
author: Gardion
